ai_analysis.summary: Anthropic's announcement to sign the EU Code of Practice indicates a commitment to regulatory compliance, while the expansion of Claude for Enterprise use suggests growing adoption of AI in enterprises.

interest_drivers: Introduction of Claude Code
Model Context Protocol (MCP)
API Reference and SDKs
Upgrade to Claude 4
ai_analysis.summary: Anthropic's new developer platform and API introduce notable technical advancements, with features like Claude Code and Model Context Protocol, indicating a significant step forward in AI/ML capabilities, but the business impact, while substantial, is more related to product updates and feature enhancements rather than groundbreaking market moves.

Search...

Research
Login
Support

Welcome
Developer Platform
Claude Code
Model Context Protocol (MCP)
API Reference
Resources
Release Notes
Build with

Learn how to get started with the Anthropic API, the Console, and Claude Code.

Ask Claude about docs…

Developer Platform

Get started

Make your first API call in minutes.

Features overview

Explore the advanced features and capabilities now available in Claude.

API reference

Integrate and scale using our API and SDKs.

Anthropic Console

Craft and test powerful prompts directly in your browser.

Release notes

Learn about changes and new features in Claude and the API.

Upgrade to Claude 4

Upgrade to the latest model to access new tools and features available in Claude 4.

Claude Code

Claude Code quickstart

Get started with Claude Code.

Claude Code reference

Consult the Claude Code reference documentation for details on feature implementation and configuration

interest_drivers: Introduction of Claude Opus 4, a new AI model
Availability of API for building AI-powered applications
Emphasis on safety and long-term well-being in AI development
ai_analysis.summary: Anthropic introduces Claude Opus 4, a new AI model, and emphasizes safety and long-term well-being in AI development, demonstrating significant technical innovation and business impact in the AI research and development space.

interest_drivers: Introduction of tiered pricing model
Availability of API and desktop extensions
Integration with Google Workspace and other tools
ai_analysis.summary: Anthropic's pricing page reveals a tiered model for its AI-powered productivity tool Claude, with features like code generation, data visualization, and web search. The introduction of a free tier, pro tier, and max tier suggests a strategic move to expand its user base and cater to different customer segments.

changes.title: Pricing \ Anthropic
changes.content_preview:
Title: Pricing \ Anthropic

Skip to main content
Skip to footer
Pricing

Pricing

Individual
Team & Enterprise
API
Free
Try Claude

$0
Free for everyone
Try Claude
Try Claude

Chat on web, iOS, Android, and on your desktop

Generate code and visualize data

Write, edit, and create content

Analyze text and images

Ability to search the web

Unlock more from Claude with desktop extensions

Pro
For everyday productivity

$17
Per month with annual subscription discount; $200 billed up front. $20 if billed monthly.
Try Claude
Try Claude
Everything in Free, plus:

More usage*

Access Claude Code directly in your terminal

Access to unlimited Projects to organize chats and documents

Access to Research

Connect Google Workspace: email, calendar, and docs

Connect your everyday tools in just a few clicks  (with remote MCP servers)

Extended thinking for complex work

Ability to use more Claude models

Max
Get the most out of Claude

From $100
Per person billed monthly

Try Claude
Try Claude
E

interest_drivers: Introduction of Claude, a new AI partner
Integration of natural conversation with documents, tools, and web knowledge
Ability to tackle complex questions and build working code
Amplification of creative potential with suggestions and functional prototypes
ai_analysis.summary: Anthropic introduces Claude, a thinking partner that connects to users' worlds, expands their capabilities, and solves complex challenges, marking a significant technical advance and potential business impact in the AI/ML landscape.

changes.title: Meet Claude \ Anthropic
changes.content_preview:
Title: Meet Claude \ Anthropic

Skip to main content
Skip to footer
Claude for
Individuals
Meet Claude, your thinking partner
Meet Claude, your thinking partner

Claude connects to your world and expands what you can do—individually or with your team.

Try Claude on web
Try Claude on web

Right now, people are asking Claude to build a bedtime story app

Try Claude on desktop:

macOS
macOS
Windows
Windows
Windows (arm64)
Windows (arm64)
Why Claude?
Connects to your world

Bring together your documents, tools, and web knowledge in a natural conversation. Claude is helpful because it understands your context.

Solves your toughest challenges

Tackle complex questions, build working code, and understand difficult concepts with clear, step-by-step help.


Amplifies your creative potential

Turn your initial ideas into polished projects with creative suggestions and functional prototypes you can actually use.

Claude Opus 4 and Sonnet 4

Our most powerful models yet, pushing the frontier for
